t: 4 Best Popcorn Makers 2025 Reviewed | Food Network
s: February 21, 2025 - In testing, we focused on both microwave and air-popped popcorn makers. Countertop air poppers stay true to the name, requiring no oil and using only circulating hot air to pop kernels. They are the healthiest popcorn maker option. Depending on the brand, they can range in size and capacity.
